mapper.insert: insert into review (writer_id, store_id, rating, comment, cre_date, upd_date) values (#{writerId},#{storeId},#{rating},#{comment},'20190101','20190101');
mapper.select: select review.store_id, store_info.store_name, review.rating, review.comment, review.cre_date, review.upd_date from review left join store_info on review.store_id = store_info.store_id where review.writer_id = #{writerId} order by review.upd_date desc

select review.writer_id, user_info.user_name, review.rating, review.comment, review.cre_date, review.upd_date from review left join user_info on review.writer_id = user_info.user_id where review.store_id = #{storeId} order by review.upd_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from review where review.writer_id = #{writerId} and review.store_id = #{storeId}
